original_text: Continue to live in a way that shows God's love. As you wait for our Lord Jesus Christ to come, remember that he is very kind. Because of that, you will have life with God for ever.
korean_text: 하나님의 사랑 안에서 자신을 지키며 영생에 이르도록 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 긍휼을 기다리라

sentences.original_text: Continue to live in a way
As you wait for our Lord Jesus Christ to come
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 주 예수 그리스도의 오심을 기다리면서

sentences.original_text: remember that he is very kind
you will have life with God for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 하나님과 함께 영원한 생명을 누릴 것이다
